portfolio.title: Plant Planner
portfolio.description: Developed an app that takes away the stress by automatically creating watering and fertilizing schedules based off of a plantâ€™s need. Simply type in the name of your plant and Plant Planner will automatically add its watering schedule to your Google Calendar.

portfolio.title: GateKept
portfolio.description: Have you ever found yourself googling 'Best thing to do in *city/country/state?' If so, you may have been met with locations that are oversaturated with tourists blocking your perfect shot. Our app is designed to connect users with local attractions that more niche and worthwile visiting.
